name: On Time Marine
description: On Time Marine is a SvelteKit and Firebase-powered booking application designed for a boat repair small business. It streamlines service requests while allowing users to invoice, add images, track hours, and generate PDFs.

name: TRO-DB
description: TRO-DB is a SvelteKit-powered fan wiki for an old MMO The Realm Online, with data managed in Sanity.io. A passion project built to preserve and document the game's history!

name: Infinite Stitch
description: Infinite Stitch is a SvelteKit-powered webpage designed for a small business to showcase crochet designs and provide a seamless contact form for commission requests.

name: Pokedex
description: The Pokédex is a SvelteKit & SCSS web application, hosted on Vercel, that consumes and caches the Pokémon API to display all Pokémon information. Gotta catch them all!

name: Ultimate Todos
description: Ultimate Todos is a Full Stack Sveltekit & Firebase CRUD application that allows users to login, manage a tidy and efficacious todo list, and persist this information across devices. Features a fully drag and droppable interface and showcases the new Svelte 5 runes.

name: React portfolio
description: A sample portfolio site utilizing React instead of Sveltekit. Utilizes Sanity CMS to display data and showcases higher order components
